welcome.subject: Welcome to LegacyGuard - Your Family Protection Journey Begins
welcome.headline: Welcome to Your Family Protection Plan
welcome.introduction: Welcome to your comprehensive family protection plan. We're here to help you secure your family's future.
welcome.step2: Add family members and trusted contacts
welcome.supportMessage: Our team is here to support you every step of the way.
welcome.securityNote: Your information is protected with bank-level security.

verification.headline: Verify Your Email Address
verification.message: Please verify your email address to complete your account setup.
verification.instruction: Click the button below to verify your email address.
verification.alternativeLink: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.linkExpiry: This verification link will expire in 24 hours.

passwordReset.headline: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.message: We received a request to reset your password.
passwordReset.instruction: Click the button below to reset your password.
passwordReset.alternativeLink: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
passwordReset.linkExpiry: This reset link will expire in 1 hour.
passwordReset.notRequested: If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore this email.

taskReminder.headline: Your Family Protection Plan Needs Attention
taskReminder.message: You have {{count}} tasks that need your attention to keep your family protected.
taskReminder.instruction: Please log in to your account to review and complete these tasks.
taskReminder.urgent: Some tasks are marked as urgent and should be completed soon.

documentExpiry.headline: Document Renewal Reminder
documentExpiry.message: The following document will expire soon and needs to be renewed:
documentExpiry.instruction: Please log in to your account to upload the renewed document.

loginAlert.headline: Account Access Notification
loginAlert.message: We detected a new login to your account.

loginAlert.wasYou: If this was you, no action is needed.
loginAlert.notYou: If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately.
loginAlert.supportContact: Our security team is available 24/7 to help you.

taskReminder.headline: Your Family Protection Plan Needs Attention
taskReminder.message: You have {{count}} tasks that need your attention.

documentExpiry.headline: Document Renewal Reminder
documentExpiry.message: The following document will expire soon: {{documentName}}

trialExpiring.headline: Your Trial is Ending Soon
trialExpiring.message: Your trial will end in {{days}} days.
trialExpiring.whatHappens: What happens when your trial ends?
trialExpiring.consequence1: You'll lose access to premium features
trialExpiring.consequence3: You won't be able to add new documents
trialExpiring.continueProtection: Continue protecting your family with our premium plan.
trialExpiring.noCommitment: No long-term commitment required. Cancel anytime.
trialExpiring.questions: Have questions? Our support team is here to help.

invitationSent.headline: Family Protection Plan Invitation
invitationSent.message: {{senderName}} has invited you to join their Family Protection Plan.
invitationSent.responsibility: As an {{role}}, you'll have access to important family information and documents.
invitationSent.access3: Set up your account if you accept
invitationSent.questions: Questions about this invitation? Contact {{senderName}} directly.
invitationSent.honor: This invitation represents trust and responsibility. Please consider it carefully.
